meanings.definition: Relating to or derived from adipic acid.
meanings.sent1: The adipic solution was used in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had an adipic smell after being in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The adipic cupcakes tasted like science.
meanings.sent4: The adipic clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The adipic color of the liquid was a vibrant blue.

meanings.sent1: The adipic mixture was carefully measured.
meanings.sent2: The adipic crystals formed a unique pattern.
meanings.sent3: The adipic salad dressing made the salad taste strange.
meanings.sent4: Her adipic voice echoed through the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The adipic texture of the fabric was smooth and cool.
